name: Rocs-Hardcore-Gleba
title: Hard Gleba
author: thesixthroc
description:
Tweaks to Gleba. Gleba items spoil twice as fast, and researching the heating tower now requires agricultural science packs to incentivize building a small science chain on Gleba.

Certain dependencies are intended to be included by default, but are listed as optional for better customizability. To get the full experience, enable this mod via the Space Age: Hard Mode modpack.
